activities.name: Copy  from ADLS to new Table

scripts.text:
SELECT * FROM ORDERS
ALTER TABLE ORDERS
ADD CITY VARCHAR(10)

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT orderdate, productkey, englishproductname, salesamount FROM Orders WHERE country = ''', variables('COUNTRY'), '''')

source.sqlReaderQuery: select DISTINCT COUNTRY,REGION from InvoiceData order by COUNTRY,REGION
select TableName,DataLakePath,DataFileName from tblMappings where IsActive = 1

scriptLines: phone as (mobile as integer, home as integer)[]
